entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
